org.bremersee.xml

Interface XmlDocumentBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XmlDocumentBuilder.DefaultBuilder

    public interface XmlDocumentBuilder
    The xml document builder.
    Author:
    Christian Bremer
